Concern: ^I've never seen you burst out like this...
ConcernContinued: ^I know Bob stepped out of line but I really think the stress is starting to get to you.
Comfort: ^I think you really need a break from all of this...
Offer: ^Maybe you should come with me to the bar later tonight?
^I won't need it, I'll be fine.
Convince: ^Things probably won't go well if the boss catches you ya know...
^Not saying you WILL be fired, but my offer is still on the table if you need it.
PoliteOfferContinued: ^...Just a heads up by the way, try not to get caught by the boss.
^If you're lucky, you'll go unnoticed and get off scott free but if not...
^Let's just hope things don't turn out that way.
ContinuedAgain: ^Whelp anyway, I'll see ya after work, good luck!
